briefTitle: Psychometric Validation (Quality-of-life Scale) in Young Women With a Non Metastatic Breast Cancer and Her Partner
officialTitle: Psychometric Validation of a Subjective Quality-of-life Scale in Young Women With a Non Metastatic Breast Cancer and Her Partner (KALICOU 2 Protocol)
primaryOutcomeMeasure: psychometric validation of a questionnaire in Young patients and their partners
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* \>18 years old (patient and partner)
* \<45 years old (patient)
* Patient with a non metastatic breast cancer
* Patient treated or previously treated by chemotherapy
* Patient and her Partner live together for at least 6 months when they complete the questionnaires.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patient or patner with psychiatric trouble
* Native language other than french
